attributes.action: To Make All Youths & Children Be Indoors By Dark.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please Make all Youths & Children be indoors by the time it reaches Night.  Children & Youths should not be hanging around street corners, back streets, or town centres after 7pm.

Also please stop Youths From hanging around in gangs, This frightens old people, young people, & Disabled.
